topics.description: Customers frequently mention the longevity and sturdiness of the massager, highlighting its ability to withstand heavy use over time.
The option for heat is a popular feature, with many customers noting how it enhances the massage experience.
Reviews often highlight the effectiveness of the massager in relieving muscle tension and pain, particularly in the back and neck.
Customers appreciate the compact size of the massager, making it easy to move and store.
Many reviews commend the company's customer service, particularly regarding warranty replacements for worn covers.
Customers mention the simplicity and ease of use of the massager's controls, enhancing the overall user experience.
The massager's ability to be used on different body parts (back, neck, legs) is frequently noted, adding to its versatility.
Customers discuss the pressure applied by the massager, with some finding it too intense or difficult to adjust.
Some reviews mention issues with the wiring and automatic directional switch, which can affect usability.
